title: Can i be un-banned for season rewards? It wasn't me.
body: Those games were people reported me for intentionally feeding was when I was staying with my grandparents and i accidental left my pc on and my brother (who's a bronze 4 scrub lol) decided to get me suspended by inting. What can i do about this? Apart from roast the lil' boi? I don't want to miss out on the season rewards because of this. I've tried my hardest to get to what. PLease understand  how this happened Riot Games. P.S I love your game <3 and the eSports scence. It's so fun to watch. K bai.

replies.body: Unfortunately in this case, it was your responsibility to secure the account, especially if you know that your brother is the kind of person who might do that. There is no way for you to get season rewards.
